item.description:
It looks like good weather for Sunday. Join us for delicious dimsum. After dimsum we burn off some calories with a leisurely walk along the greenway to the Waterfront (Columbus Park). There is a Boston "ahts" Festival going on. Let's enjoy the dimsum, nice weather, fresh air, good company & the arts festival.

Parking is always tough to find in Chinatown. We recommend you take the T to dimsum.

http://www.bostonahtsfestival.com/ahts/%28ahts%29%3A_The_Boston_Arts_Festival_Home.html
item.how_to_find_us: We will be near the front host stand

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum and Boston "ahts" Festival
